thread.title: BRIEF-Extendicare Announces Public Offering Of $110 Mln Of Convertible Debentures And Redemption Of Its Series 2012 6.00% Convertible Debentures

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Extendicare Announces Public Offering Of $110 Mln Of Convertible Debentures And Redemption Of Its Series 2012 6.00% Convertible Debentures
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Extendicare Inc:
* EXTENDICARE ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF $110 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES AND REDEMPTION OF ITS SERIES 2012 6.00% CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES
* EXTENDICARE INC - TO ISSUE ‍$110 MILLION 5.00% CONVERTIBLE UNSECURED SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES DUE APRIL 30, 2025​
* EXTENDICARE - PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO PARTIALLY FUND REDEMPTION OF CO’S OUTSTANDING CONVERTIBLE UNSECURED SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES DUE SEPT 30,2019
* EXTENDICARE INC - ‍DEBENTURES​ HAVE CONVERSION PRICE OF $12.25 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
